title: Bug 16733Builder pref  Cannot exclude folder from resource copying
description: Build 20020521  F1UI builder pref page currently prevents enter a folder name for the resourcecopy exclusion filter (folder is specified with a '/' suffix).Since 20020521, JDT/Core now supports excluding folders:The setting allowing for filtering resource copy now also supports folderfiltering. Folder names are recognized by their '/' suffix, e.g. "METAINF/"specifies filtering out all folder named 'METAINF' (and their contents)
